description:
A tiger-eared blacksmith who runs the "Vulcan`s Armory" in Labyrinthos and is Aria`s friend. She is also a C-rank adventurer, wielding a giant hammer with her innate brute strength. She has a laid-back personality, but her skills are the real deal, and she provides Aria with helpful advice. On the other hand, she can be rather shy when it comes to Tama...!?
Source: Official page
name: Vulcan
